title: Commands
about: Upspark commands consist of any exported functions in the platform.js file.
content: Fanny pack swag selvage, YOLO hashtag tacos kale chips brunch gochujang plaid small batch readymade health goth. title: Files
about: Upspark will load certain files from the platform directory

children.title: platform.js
children.about: Upspark will target platform.js as the root module. Export all commands from this file.

children.about: Upspark will optionally load a runner.css file if this exists. Use this to theme the runner.
